Automotive Cloud Fields on ApplicationFo.name: Automotive Cloud Fields on ApplicationForm
Automotive Cloud Fields on ApplicationFo.description: Standard fields extend the ApplicationForm object for use in Automotive Cloud to represent high-level information of an application that's submitted for an automotive financial product.

IntakeChannelType.description: Specifies the type of channel through which the application form is received by the system.

TierType.description: Specifies the tier type of an application form, based on which the offer terms are evaluated.

TotalDebtToIncomePercent.description: The cumulative debt to income percentage for all applicants related to the application form.

TotalIncomeToExpenseRatio.description: The cumulative expense to income ratio for all applicants related to the application form.

TotalLoanToValuePercent.description: The cumulative loan to value percentage for all applicants related to the application form.
